channel.title: Blog on Josh Fearing
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Josh Fearing

item.title: Now
item.description:
What I am thinking about or doing now:

  • Finished what is likely the last CS course I will take: Introduction to Computer Networks.
  • Interested in planning some bike tours and bike commuting (see picture) the coming of spring
  • I would like to get involved in some civic tech community here in Madison, similar to Chi Hack Night
  • I have a transit data project in the works: a dashboard of performance metrics for the buses of Madison Metro. I will likely host it here once completed.
